text: With Open Eyes is a CD-ROM developed by American studio The Voyager Companyhttps://www.mobygames.com/game/with-open-eyes for Macintosh, Pippin, and Windows 3.x.https://vintageapple.org/macuser/pdf/MacUser_9510_October_1995.pdf == Critical reception == Category:1995 video games Category:Apple Bandai Pippin games Category:Art games Category:Educational video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
